articles.description: Guillermo Söhnlein, co-founder of OceanGate, the company behind the ill-fated Titan submersible, is now focusing on human exploration of Venus.
articles.content: Söhnlein believes Venus is a more viable option than Mars due to its closer proximity, similar orbit, lower cost, more frequent flight windows, shorter transit times, and higher safety.
